summary:
- **Security Issuance Details**:  
  - **166,483 Share Appreciation Rights (TLXAO)** issued to MD & CEO Christian Behrenbruch on 13/06/2025.  
    - Notional exercise price: **$28.67**.  
    - Performance-based vesting (2025–2027).  
  - **2,595 Deferred Share Rights (TLXAU)** issued to same executive on same date.  
    - Nil exercise price; service-conditioned vesting.  

- **Capital Structure Update**:  
  - Total ordinary shares (TLX) on issue: **338,248,789**.  
  - Unquoted securities include **15.8m Share Appreciation Rights (TLXAO)** and **10,561 Deferred Share Rights (TLXAU)** post-issuance.  

- **Governance**:  
  - Issued under approved employee incentive scheme (terms in [2024 Remuneration Report](https://ir.telixpharma.com/reports)).  

*No material trading or capital impact identified (routine executive remuneration issuance).*
